Plot
An uproar is caused when some mutilated cadavers are discovered, 
giving way to the legend of the "Werewolf of Allariz". 
A traveling vendor rolls through the forest in his old wagon. 
A woman from every village on his route faithfully awaits him. 
He&#039;s attractive, intelligent, charming.... But he&#039;s also the 
monster feared by all. His most recent prey, Barbara will soon 
become the one who hunts him down. The film is based on the 
true-life story of Manuel Blanco Romasanta, the traveling vendor, 
who confessed to the murders of thirteen people, using their body 
fat to make soap. Romasanta was tried in AllarÃƒÂ­z in 1852 and 
avoided capital punishment by proclaiming he was a werewolf. 
Barbara was the lone survivor of four sisters.
